s.text: The industry counterspin: Then we should pay nothing, since smoking saves money by shortening lives.
The report says that thanks to preparation by large companies and federal and state governments, the computer bug will cause few disruptions in most Americans' lives.

A unanimous jury condemned avowed racist Lawrence Russell Brewer for killing James Byrd Jr., a black man who was dragged alive for three miles behind a pickup truck before his head was torn off by a concrete culvert.
